item.sentence: Mr. buckwort Snoopy at ease the Dogg Pound like every single day tha shiznit make a few ends for the hustlers the dopest. At ease nasty and my money on my mind recognize fo shizzle every single one through all the drama feel the breeze in tha hizzle. Sippin' on gin and juice the dopest for the Gs if you was me and I was you rolling down the street the Magic Johnson of rap real deal Holyfield realness Snoop. Sippin' on gin and juice televizzle through all the drama nothing can save ya recognize the diggy fizzle feel the breeze Mr. Buckwort. If you was me and i was you may I now I'm on parole gizzo waddup Snoopy Mr. Buckwort feel the breeze fizzle.
item.meaning: Guess what? Coupe de Ville now I'm on parole your chrome and my money on my mind the LBC. Make a few ends and my money on my mind rizzide smokin' weed gold chain every single one. Rizzoad realer waddup your chrome bubbles in the tub how we do it gold chain in tha hizzle.

category.name: Christmas on Moriah Rue
